hero.title: Empowering Digital India for Everyone
hero.subtitle: SewaSetu - Technology for All. Bridging the technology gap across all communities - from shopkeepers to farmers, elderly to workers. Building a truly inclusive digital ecosystem.
hero.techForAllDesc: Enabling every citizen with digital tools and knowledge

about.title: Building Viksit Bharat Through Digital Inclusion
about.subtitle: Supporting India's vision to become a developed nation by 2047 through inclusive digital transformation
about.challengeText1: While India leads the world in digital innovation, 70% of our rural population still lacks meaningful access to digital services. This gap prevents millions from participating in the digital economy.
about.challengeText2: From elderly citizens struggling with banking apps to farmers missing market price updates, from shopkeepers unable to adopt digital payments to workers missing job opportunities - the digital divide affects every community.
about.challengeText3: Viksit Bharat can only be achieved when every Indian has the tools and knowledge to thrive in the digital age.
about.mission1: Bridge the digital gap across all communities
about.mission3: Empower every citizen with digital tools
about.whyDesc: Tailored solutions for each community's unique needs - from UPI training for shopkeepers to health services for elderly citizens.
about.inclusiveDesc: Hindi and English support, simplified interfaces, and step-by-step guidance make technology accessible to all literacy levels.
about.communityDesc: Understanding that each community has unique challenges - from farmers needing weather updates to women seeking safety tools.

categories.title: Technology Solutions for Every Community

categories.elderlyDesc: Simplified technology training and healthcare digital services for senior citizens.
categories.farmersDesc: Weather updates, market prices, and agricultural tools.
categories.workersDesc: Skills training, job portals, and digital literacy.
categories.womenDesc: Digital empowerment, entrepreneurship, and safety tools.
categories.othersDesc: Get personalized support for your digital transformation journey.
